motion.author: ctessum
motion.title: Update SuperFast documentation
motion.description:
https://github.com/EarthSciML/GasChem.jl/blob/c9562f3566e53194e21183b33ae5415a766a61d4/docs/src/index.md?plain=1#L12

Update to reflect new version. Also update so that figures are automatically generated [like this](https://github.com/EarthSciML/Aerosol.jl/blob/a0d51441147b39cae501fa3b27fcfee5108d1834/docs/src/isorropia/examples.md?plain=1#L172) rather than being saved ahead of time.  Some documentation about how to do this is [here](https://documenter.juliadocs.org/stable/man/syntax/#@example-block).
